name: Go Gallery
description: The app I developed is designed to enhance accessibility for individuals with disabilities and for anyone wishing to explore art from the comfort of their home or any location.

name: Re-Wrap
description: Through market research, our team developed ReWrap, the sustainable solution to gift wrapping waste. ReWrap eliminates the need for paper, scissors, and tape.

name: UX-UI/Marketing
description: I was in charge of creating a website and marketing for my class creating products to take to market on Pearl Street in Boulder.
